name: GlueUp
author: Glue Up

sections.description:
All-in-one engagement management CRM, designed to transform your membership management with events, community, email and other powerful digital tools.

Third-Party Services Usage

This plugin relies on the following third-party services for certain functionalities:

  • GlueUp: Our plugin interacts with GlueUp’s API to provide [specific functionality, e.g., event management, membership subscriptions]. Data such as [specify what data is sent, e.g., event details, user information] may be transmitted to GlueUp for processing.

Domains used in the plugin are:
– https://app.glueup
– https://api.glueup

Please refer to the following links for more information about GlueUp:
– GlueUp Website
– GlueUp Terms of Use
– GlueUp Privacy Policy
